support.description: Content is actively maintained. Please report errors and inconsistencies

author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Bhikkhu Sujato, 2018. Dedicated to the public domain via Creative Commons Zero (CC0). You are encouraged to copy, reproduce, adapt, alter, or otherwise make use of this translation in any way you wish. Attribution is appreciated but not legally required.

segments.pli: “Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na sevitabbo.
segments.en: “Mendicants, you should not associate with a person who has ten qualities.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, kāmesumicchācārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, pisuṇavāco hoti, pharusavāco hoti, samphappalāpī hoti, abhijjhālu hoti, byāpannacitto hoti, micchādiṭṭhiko hoti—
segments.en: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na sevitabbo.
segments.en: You should not associate with a person who has these ten qualities.

segments.pli: Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo sevitabbo.
segments.en: You should associate with a person who has ten qualities.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, anabhijjhālu hoti, abyāpannacitto hoti, sammādiṭṭhiko hoti—
segments.en: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo sevitabbo. (1)
segments.en: You should associate with a person who has these ten qualities.”

segments.pli: Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo na bhajitabbo … pe …
segments.en: “Mendicants, you should not frequent a person who has ten qualities.

segments.pli: Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato puggalo bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavati …
segments.en: A person who has these ten qualities makes much bad karma. …

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato hoti, samphappalāpā paṭivirato hoti, anabhijjhālu hoti, abyāpannacitto hoti, sammādiṭṭhiko hoti—
segments.en: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. They’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannāgato puggalo bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavatī”ti. (12)
segments.en: A person who has these ten qualities makes much merit.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, you should not associate with a person who…
